title: Korean beef and brown rice bowl
ingredients: ['450g lean beef mince', '5 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon freshly grated ginger', '2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '120ml reduced salt soy sauce', '75g light brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '6 spring onions, chopped, divided', '775g hot cooked brown rice', '1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds']
